courses.title: Introduction to Data Analysis Techniques
courses.description: Learn the foundational techniques for analyzing and visualizing data, including statistics, data wrangling, and basic machine learning.
learning_points: Master the fundamentals of data cleaning and preprocessing.
Learn to apply statistical techniques for data analysis and interpretation.
Gain proficiency in using data visualization tools to communicate insights effectively.

courses.title: Basics of Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Explore the tools and techniques ethical hackers use to identify vulnerabilities and secure systems against cyber threats.
learning_points: Understand the core principles of network security and vulnerabilities.
Develop skills in penetration testing and vulnerability assessment.
Learn to identify and mitigate security threats to protect systems and data.

courses.title: Mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
courses.description: Build stunning, responsive websites by mastering the core technologies of front-end web development.
learning_points: Build interactive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Learn to design responsive and user-friendly web interfaces.
Master front-end development frameworks like React or Angular.

courses.title: Database Design and SQL Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand how to design robust databases and write efficient SQL queries to manage and retrieve data.
learning_points: Understand the principles of database design and normalization.
Learn to write efficient SQL queries to retrieve, manipulate, and analyze data.
Gain skills in database administration and optimization.

courses.title: Build Your First 3D Game in Java
courses.description: Dive into game development by designing and coding a complete 3D game from scratch using beginner-friendly tools.
learning_points: Learn the basics of 3D game development concepts and techniques.
Use Java and a game engine like LibGDX to create interactive 3D games.
Understand game physics, lighting, and collision detection.

courses.title: Networking Essentials for Beginners
courses.description: Discover how computer networks operate, from the basics of IP addressing to configuring simple networks.
learning_points: Learn the fundamentals of computer networking and network protocols.
Understand network topologies, addressing, and routing concepts.
Gain practical skills in network configuration and troubleshooting.

courses.title: Create Native Android Apps with Kotlin
courses.description: Learn how to create beautiful, cross-platform mobile apps using Kotlin and Jetpack programming language.
learning_points: Learn the Kotlin programming language for Android app development.
Master the Android SDK and Android Studio IDE.
Build high-performance and user-friendly Android apps.

courses.title: Beautiful Desktop Apps with Python and QT
courses.description: Build responsive, efficient and cross-platform desktop application with the Python programming language and QT framework.
learning_points: Learn to design and develop visually appealing desktop applications using Python.
Master the PyQt framework for creating user-friendly interfaces.
Understand how to integrate database functionality into your applications.

courses.title: RESTful APIs with Node.js
courses.description: Build scalable and efficient back-end systems by creating RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js.
learning_points: Gain a deep understanding of RESTful API design principles.
Learn to build efficient and scalable Node.js-based APIs.
Master data modeling, routing, and error handling in Node.js.

courses.title: Machine Learning from Zero to Hero
courses.description: Get started with machine learning by building simple models and understanding the concepts behind AI algorithms.
learning_points: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning and data science.
Master popular machine learning algorithms like linear regression and decision trees.
Gain hands-on experience building predictive models and solving real-world problems.
